meanings.definition: A person who abstains completely from alcoholic drinks.
meanings.sent1: My friend is a teetotals and never drinks alcohol.
meanings.sent2: Teetotals are individuals who choose not to consume any alcoholic beverages.
meanings.sent3: The teetotals at the party enjoyed their sparkling water while others sipped on wine.
meanings.sent4: She stood out like a teetotals in a room full of wine enthusiasts.
meanings.sent5: Being a teetotals means saying no to every drop of alcohol, no exceptions.

meanings.definition: To abstain completely from alcoholic drinks.
